title: Software Engineer III
description: Been an individual contributor in my project i.e. writing new and maintaining old code, designing backend architecture, queries and DB tables.
Implemented a new process which streamlined all logs and alerts.
Eliminated common pitfalls by stressing more on unit tests to increase overall code coverage, and improved functionality coverage.
Also maintained more than 80% code coverage.
Been working on CI-CD pipelines, Jenkins jobs, and SONAR and comfortable in writing CI-CD pipelines.
Adapted to a fast-paced environment where code commits are done hourly and the feature flags are heavily used.
